CtaDownload.title: Download the Free AI Content Detector for iPhone
CtaDownload.description: Check for AI text and images in seconds, fully offline. Your data never leaves your phone - privacy built in.

aiImageDetector.title: Check If AI Generated That Photo on Your iPhone
aiImageDetector.description: Romance scams stole $1.14 billion from consumers in 2023, the highest losses of any imposter fraud, <ftcLink>says the FTC</ftcLink>. Swindlers now spin up <fakeDatingLink>fake dating profiles</fakeDatingLink> with AI-generated faces and chatbots. Our AI image detector lives on your iPhone, so you can check if AI generated that selfie, receipt, or product shot before you swipe or buy. It flags watermarks plus subtle face artefacts the human eye misses.

aiTextDetector.title: AI Text Detector With Unlimited Word Count
aiTextDetector.description: Nearly 90% of students admitted using ChatGPT for homework <forbesLink>in early 2023</forbesLink>, and teen usage <pewLink>doubled again by 2025</pewLink>. Educators, editors, and lawyers can paste any document into Slop Or Not's AI text detector to check if AI generated the words - no word caps, no cloud snooping. English today; more languages soon.

aiFingerprints.title: Remove AI Fingerprints and Humanise AI on iPhone
aiFingerprints.description: Cloud "AI humaniser" sites often pipe your words into remote LLMs that leave new fingerprints behind. Slop Or Not scrubs zero-width spaces, homoglyphs, and spacing tricks - like the binary pattern <elonLink>Elon Musk used in 2008 to catch a Tesla leaker</elonLink> - without rewriting your style.

stickerPack.title: AI Slop Sticker Pack
stickerPack.description: Found a fake? Drop our AI Slop sticker pack into iMessage or social posts and call it out with style. Because defending truth should also be fun.
stickerPack.imageAlt: AI Slop iMessage Sticker Pack from Slop Or Not, featuring various meme characters pointing at "AI Slop" and "Slop!" text

HelpPage.title: Slop Or Not FAQ | AI Content Detector Support
HelpPage.description: Get support for the Slop Or Not AI content detector. Our FAQ covers on-device privacy, accuracy, subscriptions, and how to check text and images for AI.

HelpHero.title: Slop Or Not Help & FAQ
HelpHero.description: Here are answers to common questions about Slop Or Not. If you don‚Äôt find what you‚Äôre looking for here, please see our support options at the bottom.

cta.title: Ready to spot the slop and protect your privacy?

whatIs.question: What is Slop Or Not?
whatIs.answer: Slop Or Not is the world's first AI content detector that runs entirely on your iPhone. It instantly checks text and images to determine if they were made by AI. Because it works on-device, your data stays 100% private and never leaves your phone. It's fast, secure, and works even without an internet connection.

howDoICheck.question: How do I check content for AI?

checkText.title: Check Text:
checkText.description: Copy the text you want to analyse, open Slop Or Not, and paste it into the text field. The app will provide an instant result.

checkImages.title: Check Images:
checkImages.description: Select any image or photo from your library directly within the app, or share an image from another app to Slop Or Not. The analysis happens immediately.

needsInternet.question: Does Slop Or Not need an internet connection to work?
needsInternet.answer: Slop Or Not performs all AI detection directly on your device. You will need an internet connection for the one-time setup to download the AI models. After that, you can check text and images completely offline. We use Apple's CoreML model encryption to protect our on-device transformer models. iOS may occasionally need an internet connection to refresh model encryption keys from the App Store.

isDataPrivate.question: Is my data private when I use the app?
isDataPrivate.answer: Yes, 100%. Unlike other AI detectors that upload your data to a server for analysis, Slop Or Not processes everything locally on your iPhone. Your text, images, and photos never leave your device, guaranteeing complete privacy. This is ideal for checking sensitive information like legal documents, client emails, or medical records. We're based in the EU and fully comply with GDPR and CCPA, so your rights and data protection are always upheld.

whoShouldUse.question: Who should use Slop Or Not?

answer.intro: Anyone who values truth and privacy! It's especially useful for:

shoppers.title: Shoppers

anyone.title: Anyone
anyone.description: wanting to identify misinformation and deepfakes on social media.

howAccurate.question: How accurate is the AI detection?

answer.intro: Slop Or Not uses industry-leading models for high accuracy:

watermarkedImages.title: Watermarked Images (C2PA/IPTC from Gemini image generation, OpenAI image generation, Microsoft Designer, Adobe Firefly, etc):

answer.note: *Note: Accuracy is based on our internal tests. Results can vary with new AI models and advanced methods designed to trick detectors.*

textCleanup.question: What is the "Text Cleanup" feature?
textCleanup.answer: AI-generated text often contains hidden characters or weird formatting that can act as invisible watermarks. Our Text Cleanup feature removes these traces with a single tap. It removes: hidden characters (like zero-width spaces), suspicious punctuation and homoglyphs (letters that look like others). It can also normalise spelling (e.g., from US to UK English) and fix punctuation for you.

stickerPacks.question: What are the AI Slop sticker packs?
stickerPacks.answer: They are fun iMessage sticker packs included with the app! When you find AI-generated content online or in chats, you can use our stickers to call it out in a lighthearted way.

incognitoMode.question: What is Incognito Mode?
incognitoMode.answer: Incognito Mode provides an extra layer of privacy. When enabled, the app won‚Äôt keep a history of the content you‚Äôve checked. It‚Äôs perfect for when you are handling extra-sensitive information and want to leave no trace of the check on your device.

whyDownload.question: Why does the app download files after I install it?
whyDownload.answer: To give you a faster download from the App Store and save storage space on your device, we keep the initial app size small. The first time you launch Slop Or Not, it automatically downloads our powerful AI detection models using Apple's On-Demand Resources system. This is a one-time process. Occasionally, issues with Apple's service can interrupt this download. If it seems stuck, please check your internet connection and restart the app after a few minutes. The download should resume automatically.

imageResolution.question: Does image resolution affect detection scores?
imageResolution.answer: Yes. When you use a low-resolution thumbnail or a screenshot, the model still runs but may return a lower confidence score because fine details are lost during our normalisation step. Always try to use the original or highest-quality version of the picture. More pixels mean more clues for the detector, so results are stronger and more stable.

howMuchText.question: How much text do I need for reliable detection?
howMuchText.answer: The text detector needs at least two full sentences to work. Very short snippets give too little context for the model to spot AI fingerprints. Whenever possible, paste a whole paragraph or the entire document. The longer the passage, the higher the detection confidence.

notDetecting.question: The app isn't detecting AI content I'm sure is AI-generated. Why?

answer.intro: The world of AI is changing fast. While our detector is highly accurate, some new AI models may create content that is harder to detect. We regularly update our models to keep up.
answer.checkImage: The image you checked might be a low-resolution thumbnail or a heavily compressed screenshot. Try again with the highest-resolution version available.
answer.checkText: The text sample could be too short. Make sure you provide at least two sentences; more text improves the results.
answer.outro: These quick checks solve most ‚Äúfalse negative‚Äù reports. If the problem persists, please share the example with us so we can keep improving the app for everyone.
